name: Ordered Energy
description:
Warning: This game features lots of bright flashing and fast moving lights which may cause seizures and other complications in some players. We are working hard to get an update out as soon as possible to turn this feature on and off! Check within the next few days!

The forces of nature contend with one another. Magical energies create organized manifestations, portals and soldiers to contend with other forces of nature!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Left Mouse to Cast a Spell

Stop all of the opponents portals to win.

Requires Keyboard and Mouse currently. Will be experimenting with mobile controls shortly!

Please see below for screenshots!

Desert Grassland

Much more forces and maps to come very shortly!
